data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,397,136 lost in An-Najaf that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of An-Najaf, Iraq
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,864 believers in An-Najaf to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of An-Najaf against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in An-Najaf, Iraq to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Arab, Palestinian people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, may the churches in An-Najaf, Iraq honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 2,864 believers in the state of An-Najaf the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in An-Najaf, Iraq find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: An-Najaf
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Syrian, Urdu, Turk, Yazidi, Turk
